roleset.name: implore urgently
roleset.note: BESEECH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'beseech' based on instances in Webtext 2.5-2. VerbNet entry 60. Comparison to 'invite.' (from beseech.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: arg 1 is besought to do what?

example.name: No Action, Arg 2 specified
example.text: For two days Abather-1 stood on the highway border post *PRO*-1 beseeching successive shifts of immigration officials.
